verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Now shalt thou <S%H7200>see<s%> what I will <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>: for by a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall he let them <S%H7971>go<s%>, and by a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall he drive them <S%H1644>out<s%> of his <S%H776>land<s%>.
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3068>him<s%>, I am Jehovah:

and I <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, unto <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, as <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>; but by my <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> I was not known to <S%H3045>them<s%>.

And I have also <S%H6965>established<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H5414>them<s%>, to give them the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H4033>sojournings<s%>, wherein they <S%H1481>sojourned<s%>.

And moreover I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H5009>groaning<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> keep in <S%H5647>bondage<s%>; and I have <S%H2142>remembered<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.

Wherefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and I will <S%H3318>bring<s%> you out from under the <S%H5450>burdens<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>, and I will <S%H5337>rid<s%> you out of their <S%H5656>bondage<s%>, and I will <S%H1350>redeem<s%> you with an <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>, and with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%>:

and I will <S%H3947>take<s%> you to me for a <S%H5971>people<s%>, and I will be to you a <S%H430>God<s%>; and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, who <S%H3318>bringeth<s%> you out from under the <S%H5450>burdens<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>.

And I will <S%H935>bring<s%> you in unto the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H5375>sware<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>; and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it you for a <S%H4181>heritage<s%>: I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> so unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: but they <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> not unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> for <S%H7115>anguish<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit<s%>, and for <S%H7186>cruel<s%> <S%H5656>bondage<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Go <S%H935><s%> <S%H1696>in<s%>, speak unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, that he let the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> go <S%H7971>out<s%> of his <S%H776>land<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H1121>Behold<s%>, the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have not <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto <S%H6547>me<s%>; how then shall Pharaoh <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H589>me<s%>, who am of <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%>?

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and gave them a <S%H6680>charge<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, to <S%H3318>bring<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

These are the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%>. The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> the <S%H1060>first-born<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H2585>Hanoch<s%>, and <S%H6396>Pallu<s%>, <S%H2696>Hezron<s%>, and <S%H3756>Carmi<s%>; these are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>: <S%H3223>Jemuel<s%>, and <S%H3226>Jamin<s%>, and <S%H161>Ohad<s%>, and <S%H3199>Jachin<s%>, and <S%H6714>Zohar<s%>, and <S%H7586>Shaul<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a Canaanitish <S%H3669>woman<s%>; these are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>.

And these are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> according to their <S%H8435>generations<s%>: <S%H1648>Gershon<s%>, and <S%H6955>Kohath<s%>, and <S%H4847>Merari<s%>; and the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> were a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%>: <S%H3845>Libni<s%> and <S%H8096>Shimei<s%>, according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%>: <S%H6019>Amram<s%>, and <S%H3324>Izhar<s%>, and <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>, and <S%H5816>Uzziel<s%>; and the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> were a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>: <S%H4249>Mahli<s%> and <S%H4187>Mushi<s%>. These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3878>Levites<s%> according to their <S%H8435>generations<s%>.

And <S%H6019>Amram<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him <S%H3115>Jochebed<s%> his <S%H1733>father<s%>'s sister to <S%H802>wife<s%>; and she <S%H3205>bare<s%> him <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%>: and the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H6019>Amram<s%> were a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3324>Izhar<s%>: <S%H7141>Korah<s%>, and <S%H5298>Nepheg<s%>, and <S%H2147>Zichri<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5816>Uzziel<s%>: <S%H4332>Mishael<s%>, and <S%H469>Elzaphan<s%>, and <S%H5644>Sithri<s%>.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him <S%H472>Elisheba<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H5992>Amminadab<s%>, the <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H5177>Nahshon<s%>, to <S%H802>wife<s%>; and she <S%H3205>bare<s%> him <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu<s%>, <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah<s%>: <S%H617>Assir<s%>, and <S%H511>Elkanah<s%>, and <S%H23>Abiasaph<s%>; these are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H7145>Korahites<s%>.

And <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him one of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6317>Putiel<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>; and she <S%H3205>bare<s%> him <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%>. These are the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>.

These <S%H1931><s%> are that <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, to <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Bring <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> according to their <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

These <S%H1992><s%> are they that <S%H1696>spake<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, to bring <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: these are that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>.
And it came to pass on the <S%H3117>day<s%> when <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>,

that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H1696>speak<s%> thou unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> all that I speak unto <S%H1696>thee<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H6189>Behold<s%>, I am of uncircumcised <S%H8193>lips<s%>, and how shall <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> hearken unto <S%H8085>me<s%>?
